SELECT COMPL_NO, COMPL_TTL, COMPL_DT , EM.EMP_NAME AS COMPL_EMP_NAME , E.EMP_NAME, C.EMP_CD AS COMPL_EMP_CD , EM.EMP_CD AS EMP_CD, COMPL_CN FROM COMPL_BOARD C
LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (E.EMP_CD = C.EMP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE EM ON (C.COMPL_EMP_CD = EM.EMP_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND C.COMPL_EMP_CD = E.EMP_CD) WHERE COMPL_NO = #{complNo}

SELECT B.EMP_NAME AS COMPL_EMP_NAME , DEP_NAME FROM ( SELECT COMPL_EMP_CD, COUNT(COMPL_EMP_CD) AS COUNT FROM COMPL_BOARD GROUP BY COMPL_EMP_CD ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON (A.COMPL_EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON (B.DEP_CD = C.DEP_CD) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT ROWNUM as rnum , COMPL_NO, EMP_NAME , COMPL_EMP_CD, COMPL_TTL, COMPL_CN, COMPL_DT FROM COMPL_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON(A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) WHERE A.EMP_CD = #{empCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
